Posts.Content: May 22, 2012 08:00PM Hopem1207 wrote: Spamgirl, Please keep a watch on your cough! I have mets. to lungs & developed pneumonia last year. I was in the hospital for over 2 months. It wasn't the cancer holding me down , its was the pneumonia taking over. How long have you been on Halavan? I started in January and so far things are going ok.
Posts.Title: Any of you ladies with mets to lungs .... Karen2012 BouncingBetties
Any of you ladies with mets to lungs .... Karen2012 BouncingBetties

Posts.Content: May 22, 2012 07:44PM - edited May 22, 2012 07:56PM by Hopem1207 You are right,people just don't get it! I'm 41 trying to raise a 4 yr.old little girl while fighting stage IV breast cancer. I don't want to seem bitter, but I just look at some people and want to scream " I'm only 41" you've raised your kids. I'm mad, sad, and still living in denial. My daughter doesn't understand what's happening to Mommy. Living with cancer at any age is difficult, but before you say you understand how we're feeling "Do you really"?
Posts.Title: No, you don't understand... Stormynyte Reneepals
